original_text: Have ye forgotten the wickedness of your fathers, and the wickedness of the kings of Judah, and the wickedness of their wives, and your own wickedness, and the wickedness of your wives, which they have committed in the land of Judah, and in the streets of Jerusalem?
korean_text: 너희가 유다 땅과 예루살렘 거리에서 행한 너희 조상들의 악행과 유다 왕들의 악행과 왕비들의 악행과 너희의 악행과 너희 아내들의 악행을 잊었느냐

sentences.original_text: Have ye forgotten the wickedness of your fathers
and the wickedness of the kings of Judah
and the wickedness of their wives
and the wickedness of your wives
which they have committed in the land of Judah
and in the streets of Jerusalem?
